titles.title: Victim Compensation and Assistance Act Amendments of 1987
A bill to extend the authorization of the Victim Compensation and Assistance Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/17/1987--Introduced. Victim Compensation and Assistance Act Amendments of 1987 - Amends the Victims of Crime Act of 1984 to extend authority for the Crime Victims Fund through FY 1992.
